Accelerate your research with ease.

Unlock the power of streamlined company insights and seamlessly access essential metrics to drive data-driven decisions. All without leaving your browser! Access private company employee counts, financials and funding history and integrate Cyndx into your workflow to stay productive throughout your research process.

You must have an active Cyndx Finder license to use this product.

Disclaimer: The Cyndx Chrome Extension is an exclusive tool for Cyndx platform members and is subject to the terms and conditions of the Cyndx platform.
